DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : The purpose study determine effect twelve week aerobic exercise program erythrocyte level woman breast cancer chemotherapy . Methods : Thirty woman breast cancer chemotherapy Sydalshhda hospital ( age 47-65 year ) volunteer study , randomly select exercise ( n = 15 ) control ( n = 15 ) group . Exercise group complete twelve-week aerobic exercise training program consist three session per week , session last 30 60 minute 50 75 percent maximum heart rate reserve , control group follow . Blood sample include red blood cell count ( RBC ) , hematocrit ( HCT ) , hemoglobin ( HB ) , peak oxygen consumption 12 week aerobic exercise measure . For analysis data , repeated-measures analysis variance ( ANOVA ) use .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Aerobic Training Women With Breast Cancer After Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: woman breast cancer , physical , physiological psychological test ; exercise limitation due neuromuscular and/or musculoskeletal disease ; health problem prevent maximum effort treadmill test . woman erythropoietin treatment , uncontrolled cardiovascular pulmonary disease , uncontrolled arrhythmia , orthopedic condition would limit exercise participation , refusal randomization , participation aerobic exercise training within 3 month begin study .
